title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2236/89 of 25 July 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 4202/88 fixing the reference prices for fishery products for the 1989 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2236/89
of 25 July 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 4202/88 fixing the reference prices for fishery products for the 1989 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1989.
For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 148, 1. 6. 1989, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1988, p. 9.
(4) OJ No L 333, 21. 12. 1984, p. 41.
(5) See page 9 of this Official Journal.
